revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Rockets Hideout |image = [[File:Team Rockets Hideout.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Team Rockets Hideout |tokens = 5,500 |location = Mahogany Town }} '''Team Rockets Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 104,100 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]]Geodude || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Jed || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Voltorb.png|40px]]Voltorb || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat, [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Electrode.png|40px]]Electrode || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Koffing.png|40px]]Koffing || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Ross || [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Mitch || [[File:Ditto.png|40px]] Ditto |- |}

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
